entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-02
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Adds lightbulb option to offer implementing `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
